text: Shannon M. Zimmerman (born March 15, 1972) is an American businessman and politician.https://docs.legis.wisconsin.gov/2017/legislators/assembly/1636 From River Falls, Wisconsin, Zimmerman owns the Belle Vinez Vineyard and Winery since 2015. Zimmerman served in the Wisconsin State Assembly since 2017 and is a Republican.Votesmart.org.-Shannon ZimmermanOurCampaign.com.-Shannon Zimmerman ==Notes== ==External links== *Wisconsin Assembly-Representative Shannon Zimmerman Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:People from River Falls, Wisconsin Category:Businesspeople from Wisconsin Category:Chippewa Valley Technical College alumni Category:University of Wisconsin-Milwaukee alumni Category:Wisconsin Republicans Category:Members of the Wisconsin State Assembly
title: Shannon Zimmerman
